alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 03 at 3:44AM MDT until November 04 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT... Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gust up to 55 mph. * WHERE... Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet, East Slopes of the Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS... Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet
